group_1.narration: I see scenes from the distant past.@The tragedy of becoming a human sacrifice,@that terrifying moment of slaughter...
And...the sight of so many Magical Girls@turning into Witches.
What is this?@Why is this happening...?
As I watched without understanding why,@I realized all these visions had one thing in common:
No matter how hard we try,@no matter how righteous we are,@everything always ends in despair.
My conviction grows stronger,@as does my terrible, burning hatred.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: What's the matter with you?@I've been calling you all day!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry... I zoned out...
...Hey, are you going to make another plan?
Well, why don't we try something different@this time?
Well, one thing I had in mind...
...was to set Magical Girls against each other@over something that seems impossible,
to the point they start seeing their friends@as enemies...
I think we've been going a little too easy@on them.
Witches have been doing most of the work.
So let's mess with things ourselves and wreak@some havoc!
...Sounds fun, right?

group_1.textRight: Well, we can't use Witches anymore...

group_1.textLeft: Seriously?

group_1.textRight: Mm...well, more specifically, we've got fewer@powerful Witches in our stable.
Our numbers are still solid, though.@Don't worry about that.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Oh, good.

group_1.textRight: ...Well, it could still be a problem, so why don't@we go fetch ourselves a Witch, huh?

group_1.textLeft: So you don't want to do this, Hanna.
You don't really want to do my plan, do you?@That's why you pivoted to hunting Witches...
I can read you like an open book, Hanna...@*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Alright, let's do your thing. I don't want you@getting all suspicious of me like that.

group_1.textLeft: I knew you would say that.
According to our map...right here.
Oh, I didn't realize that's what it was...
It just made me feel uncomfortable when@we were passing by.
There might be Magical Girls there...@So c'mon, let's go!

group_1.textRight: But before we commit ourselves, I wanna get@a feel for how things are.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* ...You take this so seriously, Hanna.

group_1.narration: And so we went to check out the orphanage.
It was called the Azalea House.
